name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Address Verification
description: This is a repository of address verification APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Data8 Ltd
apis.description: We believe that clean accurate data is the key to every successful business and this has been our philosophy since 2005. This philosophy has enabled us to become the leading total data quality solutions provider by simplifying and automating data management processes, so customers can completely trust their data.

apis.name: Service Objects
apis.description: With our suite of data verification APIs for phone, email, address and more, you can keep your businesss database clean, accurate, and up to date.

apis.name: StrikeIron
apis.description: StrikeIron is the leader in Data-as-a-Service (DaaS), delivering data quality and communications solutions via our cloud platform IronCloud. We provide address verification, email verification, phone validation, phone append, SMS text messaging, and sales tax solutions to customers in a variety of markets. Our solutions are delivered as Web services that can be easily integrated into any application or system. Additionally, our solutions are pre-integrated into leading platforms like: Salesforce.com, Magento, Informatica, Oracle CRM On-Demand, and more.

apis.name: SmartyStreets
apis.description: Address Verification tools for USPS & International Addresses. Verify addresses with our easy-to-use list processing tools, APIs with 100% uptime, and more.

apis.name: SmartyStreets
apis.description: Address Verification tools for USPS & International Addresses. Verify addresses with our easy-to-use list processing tools, APIs with 100% uptime, and more.
